name: 曾德樟
objective:
本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：
1.Introduction
2.Representation of signals and systems
3.Continuous-wave modulation
4.Random signals and noise
5.Noise in modulation system
6.Pulse modulation
schedule:
1.Introduction:(第一週-第二週)
(1). The communication process
(2). Modulation process
(3). Analog and digital types of communication
2.Representation of signals and systems:(第三週-第六週)
(1). Signals classification
(2). Fourier analysis
(3). Transmission of signals through linear systems
(4). Complex representation of signals and systems
3.Continuous-wave modulation:(第七週-第十週)
(1). Amplitude modulation:DSB-LC, DSB-SC, SSB, VSB
(2). Angle modulation: FM, PM
(3). Superheterodyne receiver
4.Random signals and noise:(第十一週-第十三週)
(1). Probability and random variables
(2). Random processes
(3). White noise and narrowband noise
5.Noise in modulation system:(第十四週-第十六週)
(1). Noise in CW modulation systems
(2). Noise in linear receivers using coherent detection
(3). Noise in AM receivers using envelope detection
(4). Noise in FM receivers
6.Pulse modulation:(第十七週-第十八週)
(1). Sampling process
(2). PAM, PWM, PPM
(3). PCM
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考、平時考、期末考與作業。
2. 出席率。
materials: Communication Systems 4/E, Simon Haykin, John Wiley & Sons, 2000
